attributes.action: Stop HMRC from killing contracting in the UK
attributes.additional_details:
Think about it this way - a letter arrives containing a huge fine as a road you drove down 10 years ago has just been made one way.  Does that seem possible, let alone right or fair?? Well that's what this government are doing to contractors in my situation.

Please sign and make others aware of this issue.
attributes.background: If you saw the budget last week you'll know that HMG seem to want to kill off contracting in the UK, starting with the public sector.

rejection.details: If you would like the Government to change a specific policy, you could start a petition calling for that.
